website_summaries.verdict: The price of this small plastic device is hard to beat, and no complex installation is required.
pros: If you have a small pool and are looking for an easy way to increase the temperature by a few degrees, this device is a good budget option that may require you to get a bit creative
By slowly drawing water through a garden hose, the device allows you to divert sun-heated water back into your pool
Works best with small pools of around 12,000 gallons
cons: If you have a high-powered pump or a large pool, this option may not be for you
Not a reliable choice for rapidly heating your pool or significantly increasing water temperature

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Not worth the money. Build one from any hardware store pvc plumbing supplies!
customer_reviews.text: Good idea but inferior construction. Used this last summer for the whole season. The plastic doesn't hold up and the dark blue part keeps popping off. We ended up going to the hardware store and buying connections in the plumbing section and making the same thing, but better, for about $5. We got a connection to screw into the inlet, then used an elbow joint to turn it, then adapted it down to the house connector size and connected the black tubing. Very easy, much cheaper, and it doesn't pop off or come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Linsey

customer_reviews.title: It works pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job. It was 77 here today. I ran the pump all day, pool temp went from 68-73. Water coming out of hose was 80. I floated and put my feet under the hose, it felt great. It's not a miracle worker, but it does help. Plus, I don't have a black hose yet, I have a green cloth hose that expands. So a black hose would probably really heat it up. Also, you have to have it wide open, then turn the pump on, then start closing it until you get a stream of water through the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: We had a couple good days of hot weather and even though the water isn't hot, it does make the water warmer. I used this with a solar cover as well and my water temp has increased 9 degrees in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: It definatly does what it says it will do
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable opening definatly lets you fine tune the flow to send just enought water through the black hose but it is a minimal heating effect on a 13,000 gallon pool. Every little bit helps though and for the cost and simplicity it definatly takes the cold edge off, but its a streatch to call it a pool heater.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for about a week. So far it works as intended. Yes it is a flimsy piece of plastic, but it does the job. I hand tightened only as I would not recommend using any tools. Even if there were a leak, the leaking water stays in the pool. So far it is holding together.
customer_reviews.author: scally

customer_reviews.title: Beluga does not work.
customer_reviews.text: The Beluga Pool Heating product does not work at all. Now I find out I can't return it. We tried many times to get the unit to work and it never had enough power to send water through hose. We followed all the instructions as stated on website. Never got this to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not for large pools
customer_reviews.text: This would be great for a small above ground pool. We have a 27' diameter and it cannot possibly heat this size. I found that water sitting in the hose does heat quite well. I think I measured it at 80 one day . However it is a drop in the bucket for us. It was worth a try! However, on the very down side: the adapter often blows off with water pressure when you turn the pool on; and, any hose is very difficult to attach because no matter how I screwed it on, the attachment site always pointed UP, and the hose is difficult to connect without getting hung up on the edge of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: shopalot

customer_reviews.title: Effective, but...
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but not strong enough. The adjuster slipped off their clips and now it leaks too much to get good flow to the hose. While mucking around with it, the whole thing fell apart and now I’m trying to rig it so it can still be used. Might be OK for a low pressure pool pump, but I guess mine is simply too strong.
customer_reviews.author: Suds

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not a fast or super cheap solution to heating water in a small pool, but it works just as advertised by creating a pretty slow stream of warmer water. In other words, it takes some time to see real results in my 12 foot circular above ground. Still, I am happy with it and would buy it again. Simple to install and take off even with a 1000 gph pool pump going. I am using it with about 50 feet of hose currently with their Intex adapter (which fits nicely). Follow their directions and you won't have a problem. The outlet end of the hose should be submerged.
customer_reviews.author: Railgee

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time purchasing this item. The 1st one lasted 2 seasons and then broke at the hose attachment point. This year we purchased it again and it was installed for 1 week and it broke in the same place. Very cheap material. Very easy to install and would work well as it did before but I wouldn't waste money on something so cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Helps Heat Inground Pool
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help heat my inground pool. I attach a 100ft rubber garden hose and lay it out on the hot concrete surrounding our pool. It definitely helps to heat the pool a few degrees a day. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Brad and Mr. David

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the first one and it was cracked where the rod goes through to hold the pieces together. Got the replacement and it was the same way
customer_reviews.author: T. Massengill

customer_reviews.title: Not a pump, not compatible with Intex
customer_reviews.text: This is a plastic part that you are supposed to hook to an already installed filter and pump. It does not fit an intex pump. $50 for it is way over priced. I bought a fountain pump with hose attachments and was half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Valve for solar heater-simple
customer_reviews.text: We use to divert water through black hose for a solar heater for our pool. Works great but the connecting valve is a bit loose with force if water. We added some plumbing tape and fixed it easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Not sure of durability but it took tons of teflon tape to actually make it seal. It really needed one more rubber gasket to actually work. Next time I will just make my own.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Razey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: To divert water through the heater hose, you have to nearly shut off water to the pool which puts too much pressure on the pump. It is poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: WillieS

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: This works great!! Forced the water thru the “heater hose” keeps the pool well about 80 degrees. I have about 300 feet of hose & keep it at a good trickle. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Believe it or not

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money...product does what it says, but theirs no way a trickel of water is going to heat up your pool anytime soon. save your money for a real pool heater system.
customer_reviews.author: enrqiue adolfo sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Cracked on arrival - 2 different orders!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t really rate its performance because it arrived cracked. Update. Received replacement today and Its CRACKED too! Seriously bad quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: works for us
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to keep the pool warm. We wrapped a hose atound the summerwaves 16 ft pool and added loquid solar cover, it has helped keep the pool warm for north Florida fall weather
customer_reviews.author: aquabandita

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: I even ordered the adapter and doesn't fit my in-ground pool. There is nothing here for me to return it, so now i just thru money out the window. Can't understand why we can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M.

customer_reviews.title: things needed
customer_reviews.text: make sure you know your pools brand and order the additional adapter that is needed. I used 100 ft of commercial grade hot water hose black in color it raises the temp on average of 8-10 degrees
customer_reviews.author: Richard Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Idea seems to be good and practical by the quality of the product is so bad that makes it impossible for this to work. Within couple minutes of use the thing became mu;itiple pieces tried putting it together but always comes apart.
customer_reviews.author: Rajan George

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us!
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my pool. I'm stuck with it because I can't get to a post office in the pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Did have to call customer service for a thread adapter to attaché. Customer service was wonderful. Thread adapter was under $3.00 and arrive promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Kianne

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Just installed, works great, need a long black hose. Steve
customer_reviews.author: Kori

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t get it installed
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the product. One I received, tried to install on a summer waves/intel pool. It required another component. Ordered the attachment which cost almost the same as the initial device. The part came with no instructions, couldn’t get it to fit and made a big mess. Tried calling the company without any success. Regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Frustrated

customer_reviews.title: intersting
customer_reviews.text: Had to rig it up to work and it does it's job
customer_reviews.author: Heike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for DIY’s
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Great for keeping the pool slightly warmer in the spring while you wait for the temperature to warm up
customer_reviews.author: CSb

customer_reviews.title: Pool heat
customer_reviews.text: The heating device does work. However the efficiency is on the low end. As manufacturer states it’s best used with a solar pool cover.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M.

customer_reviews.title: NOT worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my pool and it broke within a week of having it. At first it started to have warm water going back into the pool but it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi P

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective pool heater
customer_reviews.text: Using this plus 100’ of black hose. Getting 1 to 5 degrees increase in temp depending on amount of sun
customer_reviews.author: Knowwhentofoldem

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: It really has to be sunny and have a lot of hose to actually warm the pool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic doesn’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: Plastic broke in a week. Would have been great if it didn’t break so easily
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Holdaway Woods

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Does what it says but must have uninsulated hose for it to work best
customer_reviews.author: Lee Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Item will work for what we need the threads are ...
customer_reviews.text: Item will work for what we need the threads are smaller than the fitting it attached to. We had to put a lot of thread tape and have to hold it while we turn the pump on so it doesn't shoot off (that happened too).
customer_reviews.author: Erica R.

customer_reviews.title: Buluga Solar Pool Heater
customer_reviews.text: This is slowly increasing the water temperature but as it is only made of plastic I think it is way over priced! Outer plastic ring broke after about a week. Have tried to get response from company but after 3 weeks still no response. Do not buy from them!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: NOT a universal connection
customer_reviews.text: Total waste. I have an above ground pool with a standard size return but the Beluga doesn't fit. When I find the time I will try to make an adapter using PVC pipe fittings but this is at the bottom of my priority list right now. If I had saved the packaging I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: MickeyMom

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if it fit my unground pool
customer_reviews.text: Your product is a male connector and my in ground pool return is also a male connection.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great concept just needs better design
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do much for the pool. Most of the water went out the sides. Not very durable. Great concept just needs better design.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: We love this product for heating our pool
customer_reviews.text: We love this product for heating our pool. Easy, and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: cindy tate

customer_reviews.title: ... but you need a lots of sun and a good hose to make this work and you can bypass ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what I was expecting - but you need a lots of sun and a good hose to make this work and you can bypass using this by just strapping your hose to side of pool. I thought this would help in heating but it does nothing but hold your hose in place.
customer_reviews.author: VNice

customer_reviews.title: There Is A Reason There Are a Ton of Returns For Sale in the Amazon Warehouse
customer_reviews.text: Good idea, however having to remove it every time one uses the pool causes this otherwise innovation product to be relatively worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Schronce

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It barely screws into pool outlet so falls off a lot. Really cannot tell any difference in the temperature of the pool. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To cheap for price!
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the fact that I had to turn hose on every 2 hours to get hot water, for that I didn’t need this devise could just leave hose in sun for 2 hours and Poot the hot water in pool!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Rivera

customer_reviews.title: warmer pool
customer_reviews.text: the right adapter to make the beluga whale to heat our pool...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solar heating device
customer_reviews.text: I didn't find this product useful. It's made of plastic and even though I closed the front of the product, the water still got through and there wasn't enough pressure to get the water through the hose. I tried to return it but the thirty days was past due by the time I got the pool up and running. Made cheaply, a big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Joan M. Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: it needs attachment to secure to the filter the intake ...
customer_reviews.text: it needs attachment to secure to the filter the intake should be a clamp it took me two days to configure an attachment ..i needed to design a reducer to go through the wall and connect to the Beluga and so far so good
customer_reviews.author: jashar

customer_reviews.title: Warm Water Quickly!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked very well, we where able to warm our pool water, very quickly, and we have a 32 ft round pool
customer_reviews.author: BERNADETTE RAKITYAN

customer_reviews.title: A great gadget that works for us.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Beluga and we have had great success with this helping heat our large pool. The first one lasted for about five years and was totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: No good waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: It broke after using it 3 times, less than an 4 hours. the top came off. I wasted my money. never got my pool warm.
customer_reviews.author: D. H.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good in theory
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good in theory, but unless you have a mile of black hose, it makes little to no difference in pool temp
customer_reviews.author: taodandco

customer_reviews.title: I Like it
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is as described , will need Hayward SP1023 1-1/2 fitting to convert to a Intex 18x52" pool I Love it and heated my pool up a 2-3 degrees which is the top end of the 140$ solar coil heaters
customer_reviews.author: Joe Torres

customer_reviews.title: its just a cap
customer_reviews.text: Its useless just grab your sprinkler head and leave it closed then turn it on its just a cap for the tip of your hose its useless
customer_reviews.author: Rogelio nicasio

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit - the threads on the adapter are smaller than the threads on the Intex pool water inlet
customer_reviews.author: Paul Russo

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! No problems as long as you follow instructions. Warmed pool up by 8 degree's so far.
customer_reviews.author: spf

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This gadget is perfect for boosting the pool temp in the spring; we added two black rubber garden hoses and ran them around the pool deck which gets super hot from the sun. The water that comes out is unbelievably warm and without burning fossil fuel. It is made of plastic so don't think it will last long but the design is brilliant; just screw it into one of the jet outlets. When the temp rises in early summer it can be stored and the hose used in the yard. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: james b potter

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Kind of works, breaks very quickly at the valve. Definitely over priced for the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Howard

customer_reviews.title: Helps a little.
customer_reviews.text: We use 100 ft. of black hose with ours. Water coming out of the hose gets pretty hot. I can't say it makes a huge difference in warming the pool, but it definitely helps and at that cost, there isn't much to lose by trying it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Nejedly

customer_reviews.title: Not very strong...didn't last.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy...pressure from water broke it very quickly! Now its past the return time frame:(
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: RETURNED! All it does is slow down the flow ...
customer_reviews.text: RETURNED! All it does is slow down the flow of the water in your hose so that it warms longer in the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It needs to be longer with more threads to enable a better fit to return to prevent it from falling off ...
customer_reviews.text: eh it's okay....only used it a few times over the summer because it does not stay connected to the return. It works well to heat up water when it's working but the neck or part that screws into the return was too short. It needs to be longer with more threads to enable a better fit to return to prevent it from falling off from pressure of water coming out of return. IF this problem was fixed, it would work a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T.

customer_reviews.title: The product is bad, do not work. Is just a plastic thing and is super expensive!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product is bad, do not work. Is just a plastic thing and is super expensive!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: carlos perez

customer_reviews.title: Almost there.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, but with 2 flaws. 1- The deflector seems to move itself during the day or when the pump starts and stops. Fixed with a couple screws thru it to the body of it. 2- It need a directional flow to the pool. The water comes out straight not pushing around the pool to the skimmer.
customer_reviews.author: B. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Crap !!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I put it on it fell apart would return and get my money back if I could.
customer_reviews.author: sad buyer..

customer_reviews.title: Not a heater, just an adapter
customer_reviews.text: Just the adapter we needed. A liitle pricey for what it really is but works very well. It is not a heater. Black hoses are still needed.
customer_reviews.author: SLE

customer_reviews.title: not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great concept but it would not fit on the pool inlet. You need an adapter. Tried it on 3 different pools and inlets.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works OK but not as much flow as I need.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Pinon

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Booo the fittings did NOT fit, and after hooking it up, so much water escaped that it did absolutely nothing that would heat the pool. A waste of time and money. Buy a solar cover instead Returned it

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of it but the darker blue front part cracked the first year :(
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT......Description does not state you will need to purchase an additional adapter from them in order to fit most pools. They basically sell you an incomplete product. I emailed the company, Sounds like a man working out of his garage and he starting crying about profit margins. not a very professional person. He was a very nasty individual and I even gave in to order the adapter because I thought I was stuck. I just went to home depot and bought the same size parts in pvc and made by own converter for about $3. They want to sell you their adapter for $14.99 plus shipping.... DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Craig Petrella

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely but it doesn't fit snug into my output. Think I need an adapter of some sort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This product kicks ass! My pool is about 8 degrees warmer this year just using this and a 100ft hose I have coiled up on the side deckl. I thought it would look tacky but it worth trying over paying out for a roof installed solar unit >$60. My pool is about 24k gallons and this works to warm during the day it along side a solar cover to keep the heat in at night. The Beluga has been working about 5 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bagdon

customer_reviews.title: Used this product this weekend with 150' of black hose ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this product this weekend with 150' of black hose and our pool got to 80 degrees. We have a 15 x 30 above ground pool, we also use a solar blanket. It seems to be made well we will see over time how well it holds up. This product costs no money to use, unlike a pool heater which is about $100.00 per month. Our pool heater needs replaced and we were going to have to spend $5,500.00 to get it fixed after using it for only 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Behnken

customer_reviews.title: The idea is great, however this does not fit on the exhaust ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. The idea is great, however this does not fit on the exhaust or intake of my pool. I took it to 3 pool stores and was told that there is nothing that will fit. It has to be special made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice poor-man's approach to heating your pool
customer_reviews.text: Nice poor-man's approach to heating your pool. I recommend at least a 100' long black hose that stays in the sun most of the time for this to make any difference. It is plastic and if not careful, the dark blue front can easily pop-off if the pressure is too great. But it's also easy to pop back on.
customer_reviews.author: MDC

customer_reviews.title: it's cheaper and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive. Just use a black hose, it's cheaper and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R.

customer_reviews.title: I broke within 1 month of use. Easier to ...
customer_reviews.text: I broke within 1 month of use. Easier to make from local hardware store. I dont even want a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: but easy to install and does
customer_reviews.text: I was a skeptic, but easy to install and does work
customer_reviews.author: Pat Biddle

customer_reviews.title: Good in theory
customer_reviews.text: 1st off the fitting is not the right size..we had to buy a metal coupling to attach it to the return jet. We bought a 100 ft hose and keep it hooked up all the time. Not sure if it's helping but it produces very warm water when in direct sunlight. Tip: only let the water come out slowly so it has time to heat up in the hose.
customer_reviews.author: April Hollahan

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the product only downside would be the bulkiness ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for three days and it is working really well. I attached 275 feet of garden hose to it and the outside temperature was 83 degrees and the water coming out of the hose and into the pool was 107 degrees. I am not sure how long before I see a difference in the pool water temperature. I am happy with the product only downside would be the bulkiness of the garden hose. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Redbarnman

customer_reviews.title: but so far so good. Now if we could only get a week ...
customer_reviews.text: It works really well so far, it raised the temp. In the pool 4 degrees in one day, I still use a solar cover at night, but so far so good. Now if we could only get a week of sunny weather my pool will be sooooo warm!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Great idea. The plastic is very cheap thus threads ...
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. The plastic is very cheap thus threads do not catch and hold to pool fitting, that is, when trying to attach the garden hose the Beluga device slips out of the pool fitting. Usually takes about five tries to get it to stay in place. If it was manufactured using a rigid type plastic it would probably be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Connie J Knight

customer_reviews.title: Keeps popping off!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but it keeps popping off! Tried to screw it back in and the dang thing squirted me in the face!! I don't think they got the thread diameter right. Kind of expensive for what you get i may return it. I think that a cheap little water pump and 2 hoses might do better.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Beluga works....in my case with some mods
customer_reviews.text: The beluga works pretty good....would I recommend it hmmm don't know. lets start by saying in all fairness that it does work. but I have to say that the build quality is not the best as i had to modify the regulator in order for it to stay. my return water pressure would blow it off every time. but, get your self a nice black hose from lowes or home depot, plug in your beluga and extend you pool season. Keep in mind that if the water pressure from your pump is to much ,then some mods will come in to play.
customer_reviews.author: The Family

customer_reviews.title: ... I had hoped for even though I bought the recommended black hose
customer_reviews.text: Not the temp increase I had hoped for even though I bought the recommended black hose too
customer_reviews.author: Karen Turner

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to family and friends
customer_reviews.text: Item accurately described, arrived quickly. I would recommend this to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: This would take forever to work. We live in ...
customer_reviews.text: This would take forever to work. We live in South Carolina with lots of sun and didn't see a big difference. I guess if you used 300 feet of house all over the pool deck but what a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Not what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Did not work with the higher power pump that I use. I can see where it will be great with lower water pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but did not know it needed an ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but did not know it needed an adapter to hook up to some pools ...I have the Coleman 18ft pool and had to have extra piece
customer_reviews.author: wend a schrader

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, fits perfectly. Due to some negative reviews I tested it for about a month before reviewing and I have found no manufacturing problems as some others indicated, and it does exactly what I expected it to do - produce warm water for the pool.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: warms the water well without any additional electricity or strain on the pump
customer_reviews.author: tracy webster

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this item and returned it as it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item and returned it as it is not worth the price. You don't need this device. I went to Loews plumbing section and bought a connecter to connect a black hose to my in-ground pool's outlet and it accomplishes the same thing for a few dollars. This device is a cheap piece of plastic and not worth the exorbitant price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with my pool and caused my pump to blow.
customer_reviews.author: Traci D. Depew

customer_reviews.title: Garbage - Don't Waste Your Money!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. Piece of garbage. Did not last one day! The male fitting going into the pool return blew out the first day. Then the threads on the hose side stripped. Has potential to heat water - but it is manufactured so cheaply it is essentially garbage. Will be sending mine back to Amazon . . . in pieces.

customer_reviews.title: The product is horrible. Doesn't fit and the water never heated up
customer_reviews.text: The product is horrible. Doesn't fit and the water never heated up. I am sorry that I purchased the product. I would have returned it but didn't want to continue losing money. I give it no stars.

customer_reviews.title: Vent cap broke under pressure.
customer_reviews.text: This device is ingenious, but not made with strong enough materials. The plastic vent cap cracked after 1 week of use and I hope the manufacturer redesigns the unit. The device was returned without issue for a refund by PoolCenter.com who has a great customer service department.
customer_reviews.author: jc

product_meta.title: Beluga Pool Solutions 1652 Solar Heating Device for Swimming Pool
product_meta.description: The beluga solar pool heating device is a revolutionary way to heat your swimming pool using a garden hose. The beluga device attaches to a standard 1 1/2" return fitting on above ground or in ground swimming pools and allows you to divert a small stream of water into a garden hose. If you have ever picked up a garden hose that has been lying in the sun you know how hot the water can get. The beluga allows you to slow the water down going through the hose capturing all of the heat that the garden hose can produce. The beluga solar heating device is the least expensive heating option on the market today. Now you can get your pool up to temperature sooner, extend your pool season, recover from a cold rain or a cool evening without any additional costs; no expensive heater unit, no service bills, and no expensive energy bills.
feature_bullets: Heat your pool with a garden hose
Save hundreds on your energy bill
Easily connects to a standard 1 1/2" return fitting on above ground or in ground pools
Increase the comfort and extend the swimming season of your pool
Economical alternative to gas or electric heating
